nodes.text: Simeon Densend was a freelance repulsorcraft designer who lived on the planet Onderon during the Clone Wars, but relocated with his family to the galactic capital of Coruscant when Onderon seceded from the Galactic Republic to join the Confederacy of Independent Systems. Densend freelanced for Incom Corporation, SoroSuub Corporation and Mekuun Corporation before joining the art department of Narglatch AirTech, for whom he produced the piece "Assure Our Victory!". The poster reminded viewers to help reduce energy expenditure as part of the Republic war effort, suggesting pilots drive slower and share their vehicle.
Simeon Densend was first mentioned in the reference book Star Wars Propaganda: A History of Persuasive Art in the Galaxy, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo and released on October 25, 2016.
